item.title: [Delta 317] Few questions [Delta 317]
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

I just have a few questions/problems I need answers to…

  1. How do I change the pickup speed of items? It takes like 1 second to pick up each item an NPC drops and I want to make it faster…

  2. How do I get the skillcape shop to give you the hood with the cape and require a 99 in the skill to buy the item?

  3. How do I make a command require money to do?
    ex:

if (command.startsWith("resetmyslayertask")) {
                taskID = -1;
                taskAmount = -1;
                sM("You slayer task has been reset, talk to Duradel to get a new one.");
                updateRequired = true;
        }

  1. How do I change the name of a given item? Ex. change Amulet of fury to Amulet of God

  2. How do I fix NPC models that are messed up?

Thanks in advance for any answers I get (:

Read full topic
